item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

how do i set that up? lik were do i put my name and stuff on this code:

public static boolean isPlayerOn(String playerName) { for(int i = 0; i < maxPlayers; i++) { if(playersCurrentlyOn[i] != null){ if(playersCurrentlyOn[i].equalsIgnoreCase(playername)) return true; } }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 09:24:36 PM[/size][hr]well i was on seb and it said player is offline and when i logged into another account it still said that seb is offline so the swich affect thingy that “justlikers” said.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 09:26:45 PM[/size][hr]lol i got it to work i capitalized the “s” in seb.
lol thanks justlikers.
thread closed.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 09:32:25 PM[/size][hr]omg…thread open again srry guys for double posting…and srry justlikers didnt work…-.-
can anyone help?

item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

hey when i put this code in npchandler the npc only says “seb is offline” even when im on?

heres the code:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 8) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("seb")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Seb is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Seb is OFFLINE"; } } }

can you help?
plz i need this ASAP
thanks
